description: Jessy, an urban gardener, has 10 packets of nutrients. Jessy can share some/all packets with Bob, a local farmer who can use the nutrients to triple his crop yield. Bob then decides how much of the increased yield to share back with Jessy.

trustor_behavior_choices.trust_high: share all nutrient packets with farmer

trustee_behavior_choices.return_medium: return 40-50% of increased yield to urban gardener
trustee_behavior_choices.return_high: return more than 80% of increased yield to urban gardener
